mapper.select: select d.dealDate, b.buyPrice, b.size from deal d, buy b where d.buyCode = b.buyCode order by d.dealDate desc
select count(*) as cntDeal, avg(b.buyPrice) as avgDeal from deal d, buy b where d.buyCode = b.buyCode group by dealDate

select b.buyPrice, b.size, b.buyDate from buy b where b.buyCode not in (select d.buyCode from deal d) and date_format(b.endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(curdate(), '%Y-%m-%d') order by b.buyDate desc
select s.salesPrice, s.size, s.saleDate from sales s where s.salesCode not in (select d.salesCode from deal d) order by s.saleDate desc
